&#3938;&#4009;&#3921;: [2215] ... 1) rtsa ba/ ... dug gi sdong po rtsad nas gcod/ ... 2) thang sman gyi rigs shig ste/ ro kha/ zhu rjes bsil/ nus pas sha dug dang/ sbrul dug sogs dug tshad la phan/ ...
= sbrul dug, snyag, rgu thub dman pa.  JD 144.  SS 457.5.  DG 267.1.
root, track, place of being, actuality
